newsitem.title: USA: Muni bond sales total $1.637 bln for Oct 23.
newsitem.headline: Muni bond sales total $1.637 bln for Oct 23.

text.p: Scheduled competitive and negotiated municipal bond sales are expected to total $1.637 billion in 44 offerings for Wednesday October 23, according to Reuters Municipal Bond Information Group.
Competitive sales total $990 million in 25 offerings. The largest is a $712.6 million New Jersey Transportation Trust Fund issue at 1100 EDT.
Negotiated sales total $646 million in 19 offerings. The largest issue is a $175 million Texas Housing issue through Bear Stearns & Co.
An additional three negotiated deals totaling $51 million are on Reuter's day-to-day calendar, meaning underwriters have said they may price the issues on Wednesday depending on market conditions.
